visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render an area chart with the title 'stacking: false, connectNulls: true'. The chart should have a single series with data [1, 1, null, 1, 1]. The chart should connect null values and not stack the areas. The chart should have a white background, black axes, and a blue color for the area series. The title should be in a large, bold font, and the axes labels should be in a smaller, italic font.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an area chart with specific styling and data. The chart type is set to 'area', and it has a white background. The title of the chart is 'stacking: false, connectNulls: true', styled with a large, bold font. The plot options include connecting null values and disabling stacking. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a smaller, italic font and black color. The single series in the chart is an area type with data [1, 1, null, 1, 1], and it uses a blue color. This configuration ensures that the chart is visually appealing and adheres to the specified requirements.
